Well, here goes nothing:

Hello! I'm wondering if you guys are interested in a new maintainer? If so, I would be honored if I were able to be one. And, if need be, I believe I would be available to do it for this weekend. I know it sounds last minute, but if you guys need the help I'll be happy to lend a hand!

\*Waits for response with anticipation\*
